events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to request a refund since the product cannot be exchanged.
System identified the message as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the wrong product size delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’ll help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I’ve attached a photo showing the size label is incorrect compared to what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and help with this refund.
We have initiated the refund process, and you should see the amount credited back to your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Your refund case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
We’ve sent a short survey to hear about your experience with our support team.
